Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there have been news reports of employees at these companies contracting COVID-19.
Understate: The claim understates the number of reported cases of employees contracting COVID-19 at these companies.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there have been numerous news reports about infections and deaths from COVID-19 at stores in these chains.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that these companies have not had any reported cases of employees contracting COVID-19.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that these companies have reported cases of employees contracting COVID-19 but may not have closed their stores.
